101 
 
 [Public]  
Advancing the United Nations Sustainable Development   
(https://www.amd.com/system/files/documents/2021 -un-sdgs.pdf )  
At AMD, we believe the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) serve as a useful framework for 
tackling the world’s toughest challenges. Our company and the technology sector as a whole have a 
critical role to play in enabling the future that the SDGs aspi re to create. While not specifically designed 
around them, our priority areas and initiatives help to advance many of the SDGs. AMD is pleased to be 
a member of the UN Global Compact to advance its Ten Principles and to contribute in creating a just, 
resil ient and sustainable world.
